name: nectar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet liquid produced by flowers and collected by bees and other insects: The bee turns nectar into honey.
in ancient Greek and Roman stories, the drink of the gods: This wine tastes like nectar (= tastes excellent).

a sweet liquid produced by flowers and collected by bees: The bee turns nectar into honey.
Nectar is also a drink made from some fruits: apricot nectar
